activities: Through the collection, analysis and use of non-personally identifiable information, we offer a range of services to allow clients (advertisers) to better show users more useful and relevant online advertisements. Such non-personally identifiable information may be collected from users in the EU/EEA and Switzerland based on online behavior and usage patterns through advertisements operated by clients, and may include information such as the type of Internet browser used by an online user, a user’s computer’s IP address, cookie ID, date and time, the type of computer operating system used, the domain name of the websites visited before and after viewing an advertisement, as well as information related to websites and web pages a user is viewing when an advertisement is shown.  We do not collect, use, or process personally identifiable information from online users through advertisements operated by us.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms:
Network Advertising Initiative
and
BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; for all other data: BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
